project_name: Smart Street Lighting IoT System - Urban Infrastructure Project
technical_specifications:
Input Voltage: 90-300V AC
Control: Remote On/Off, Dimming Control
Connectivity: LoRaWAN / NB-IoT / Wi-Fi
Power Consumption: <2W per controller
Operating Temperature: -20C to +70C
Ingress Protection: IP66
Enclosure Material: UV Resistant Polycarbonate
Certifications: ['CE', 'BIS', 'RoHS']
